sections.abstract: An introduction into the world of embedded, cross-compilers, and dragons.

body.p: Cross development has traditionally been a black art, requiring a lot of research, trial and error, and perseverance. Intrepid developers face a shortage of documentation and the lack of mature, comprehensive open source toolkits for multi-platform cross development. Ongoing work by the Embedded Gentoo project, the Gentoo Toolchain herd, and other contributors is yielding a Gentoo-based development platform that greatly simplifies cross development.
This handbook aims to be the central source of embedded information with a Gentoo spin.
